title: Fantasy Music Pack 3
description: Fantasy themed seamless looping atmospheres and music tracks, fading music tracks and over 50 organic sound effects.
longDescription:
Third in the series, Fantasy Music Pack 3 includes:

LISTEN

• Over 45 minutes of seamless looping music and sound effects.

• Atmospheres perfect for traveling through a medieval town or city, exploring caves and dungeons or venturing into an enchanted forest.

• Seamless looping nature sounds and a multitude of organic sound effects

• Fading music tracks perfect for game trailers and youtube videos. 

• Layer the atmosphere tracks on top of the seamless looping nature ambience for a AAA sound.


Seamless looping music tracks included:

1. Renaissance Traveler - Full Loop Version

-- 3 additional version

2. The Ranger - Full Loop Version

-- 3 additional version

3. The Blacksmith - Full Loop Version

-- 3 additional version

4. The Bearded Swine - Full Loop Version

-- 3 additional version


Seamless looping atmospheres included:

1. The Caves of Time

2. Dawn Over ElvenWood

3. Midday Over ElvenWood

4. Nightfall Over ElvenWood

5. The Dungeon of Lost Souls


Fading music tracks included:

1. Renaissance Traveler

2. The Ranger

3. The Blacksmith

4. The Bearded Swine

5. Epic Fantasy Trailer 3

6. Orcs


Over 50 organic sound effects included.

All music tracks are wave files at 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.

All sound effects are wave files at 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.


All my music/audio products are YouTube content ID Free, this means you should never receive a copyright claim from another channel when posting videos to YouTube that include my music. If any issues ever arise please reach out to michael@mlamanna.com.
